Putin warns West of risk of nuclear war, says Moscow can strike Western targetsPresident Vladimir Putin warned Western countries on Thursday that there was a genuine risk of nuclear war if they sent their own troops to fight in Ukraine, and he said Moscow had the weapons to strike targets in the West. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 10:13:03 GMT MGP5YIXKDZOGDMMSJVKUQ2VGE44 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-warns-west-risk-nuclear-war-says-moscow-can-strike-western-targets-2024-02-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Spring came early: February likely warmest on record amid climate changeThe world likely notched its warmest February on record, as spring-like conditions caused flowers to bloom early from Japan to Mexico, left ski slopes bald of snow in Europe and pushed temperatures to 100 degrees Fahrenheit (38 C) in Texas. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 10:06:53 GMT 35IDP7EEC5MHRELGHKHSBFG7JU https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/spring-came-early-february-likely-warmest-record-amid-climate-change-2024-02-29/Jake Spring可持续发展气候与能源
Keys to lost homes in Gaza become latest symbols of Palestinian displacementPalestinians displaced by Israel's military offensive on Gaza are holding onto keys to damaged or destroyed homes as a symbol of their loss, a tradition dating back to the mass displacement of 1948. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 10:06:15 GMT KIYFIVEUNVJZNLOP722APOSA7I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/keys-lost-homes-gaza-become-latest-symbols-palestinian-displacement-2024-02-29/Saleh Salem世界中东
As Gaza death toll passes 30,000, grave-digger longs to build houses againThe mounting death toll from Israel's military offensive on the Gaza Strip is a concrete, daily reality for Ibrahim Ahmed: instead of building houses as he did before the war, he digs graves. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 09:59:29 GMT 3S6DPLGR2RPFRNYTHC7CMLJCWE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-death-toll-passes-30000-grave-digger-longs-build-houses-again-2024-02-29/Mohammed Salem世界中东
U.N. rights chief: war crimes committed by all parties in Israel-Hamas conflictU.N. human rights chief Volker Turk on Thursday said war crimes had been committed by all parties in the conflict between Israel and Hamas, calling for them to be investigated and for those responsible to be held accountable. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 09:55:12 GMT WI53XGYOCVJ2JHJ26AKSQ7SYAE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-rights-chief-war-crimes-comfilled-by-all-parties-israel-hamas-conflict-2024-02-29/Gabrielle Tétrault-Farber世界中东
Over 30,000 Palestinians killed in Israel's military offensive in Gaza since Oct.7, Gaza health ministry saysAt least 30,035 Palestinians have been killed and 70,457 wounded in Israel's military offensive in Gaza since Oct. 7, the Gaza health ministry said in a statement on Thursday. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 09:49:10 GMT RMVH7VIQUFMUVKBOXAJP424ECI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/over-30000-palestinians-killed-israels-military-offective-gaza-since-oct7-gaza-2024-02-29/Reuters世界中东
Putin's address to Russia's parliamentPresident Vladimir Putin delivered his annual state-of-the-nation address on Thursday to Russia's elite, updating them on the war in Ukraine, Moscow's nuclear capabilities, and its relationship with the West. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 09:41:49 GMT VFEDVBXKYFKRLEX4TKXYZTIJBI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/highlights-putins-address-Russias-parliament-2024-02-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Erdogan's government seeks way to curb Turkey's top court- sourcesPresident Tayyip Erdogan's government is seeking ways to curb the influence of Turkey's Constitutional Court, prompted by its rulings to free a jailed opposition parliamentarian, according to a senior official and two legislators in the governing alliance. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 09:06:00 GMT VC77KN42JJLJTDWDSXROLWSW54 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/erdogans-government-seeks-way-curb-turkeys-top-court-sources-2024-02-29/Burcu Karakas世界中东
Poland detains Russian citizen accused of being member of Islamic StatePoland's Internal Security Agency (ABW) has detained a Russian citizen accused of being a member of Islamic State (IS), the National Prosecutor's Office said in a statement on Thursday. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 08:52:14 GMT IIQGTY57MVLWNAN2P2OGOQ7XJY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-detains-Russian-citizen-accused-being-member-islamic-state-2024-02-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Norway gives Arctic foxes a helping hand amid climate woesOne by one, the crate doors swing open and five Arctic foxes bound off into the snowy landscape. Ukraine repels Russian attacks but situation is difficult, top general saysUkrainian forces have pushed back Russian troops from the village of Orlivka, west of Avdiivka, but the situation on the eastern front remains difficult, Ukrainian army chief Oleksandr Syrskyi said on Thursday.
